attributes.action: Stop people from pulling out of house sales once an agreement has been reached.
attributes.additional_details: Scotland has this in place, and as a united nation, England and Wales should be the same.  With the amount of distress caused when a sale falls through, the mental health of those involved may negatively impact the NHS.
attributes.background: Moving house is very stressful for everyone involved.  There should be a rule requiring either a 10% deposit upon offer acceptance or a clause allowing withdrawal only under extreme circumstances.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721744
